update sal_work_card set quotation_no = #{quotationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_card_no = #{workCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_card_date = #{workCardDate,jdbcType=DATE}, approval_procedures = #{outwardProcessing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, special_inspection = #{specialInspection,jdbcType=BIT}, delivery_place = #{deliveryPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery_place_content1 = #{deliveryPlaceContent1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery_place_content2 = #{deliveryPlaceContent2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipment_way = #{shipmentWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_amount = #{contractAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scene_installation = #{sceneInstallation,jdbcType=BIT}, assembly_after_check = #{assemblyAfterCheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, packaging = #{packaging,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_card_leader = #{workCardLeader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signer = #{signer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mapper.select: SELECT c.id id, c.quotation_no quotationNo, c.work_card_no workCardNo, c.work_card_leader workCardLeader, c.work_card_date workCardDate, IF(p.END_TIME_,CONCAT('审核完成'),CONCAT('审核中')) processInstanceId, c.state state FROM sal_work_card c LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst p ON c.process_instance_id = p.PROC_INST_ID_ INNER JOIN act_ru_task t ON t.PROC_INST_ID_ = c.process_instance_id AND t.ASSIGNEE_ = #{assignee} AND c.quotation_no LIKE '%${quotationNo}%-%' AND c.quotation_no LIKE '%-${quotationYear}%' AND c.work_card_no LIKE '%${workCardNo}%-%' AND c.work_card_no LIKE '%-${workCardYear}%' AND c.work_card_leader LIKE '%${workCardLeader}%' AND c.work_card_date >= #{startWorkCardDate} AND c.work_card_date <= #{endWorkCardDate} ORDER BY RIGHT(workCardNo,2) ${order},LEFT(workCardNo,6) ${order} ORDER BY RIGHT(quotationNo,2) ${order},LEFT(quotationNo,6) ${order} ORDER BY #{sort} ${order} ORDER BY RIGHT(workCardNo,2) DESC,LEFT(workCardNo,6) DESC LIMIT #{startPage},#{rows}
